name: btcstampsexplorer
description: This is the API for https://stampchain.io/ and the open source block explorer for Bitcoin Stamps.

scripts.test:api:all: npm run test:api:simple && npm run test:api:advanced && npm run test:api:performance
scripts.test:api:clean: rm -rf reports/newman* && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman
scripts.test:api:comprehensive:system: NEWMAN_FOLDER='System Health' docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman-comprehensive
scripts.test:api:comprehensive:stamps: NEWMAN_FOLDER='Stamps Endpoints' docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman-comprehensive
scripts.test:api:comprehensive:src20: NEWMAN_FOLDER='SRC-20 Endpoints' docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman-comprehensive
scripts.test:api:comprehensive:market: NEWMAN_FOLDER='Market Data' docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman-comprehensive
scripts.test:api:comprehensive:regression: npm run test:api:comprehensive && npm run test:api:report:regression
scripts.test:api:daily:regression: NEWMAN_REPORT_PREFIX=daily-regression NEWMAN_ITERATIONS=2 docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman-comprehensive
scripts.test:api:daily:analyze: npm run test:api:daily:regression && npm run test:api:report:regression && npm run test:api:validate:expected
scripts.test:api:trends:analyze: node -e "console.log('Trends analysis would run here - see daily-regression-tests.yml for implementation')"
